text: China is a 1943 American World War II drama movie directed by John Farrow and starring Loretta Young, Alan Ladd, William Bendix, Tala Birell, Philip Ahn, Richard Loo. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Farrow Category:Movies set in China Category:World War II movies
title: China (1943 movie)
